requirement: Provide a volume slider for audio control
css:
{
  "sliderWrapper": {
    "width": "400px",
    "height": "30px",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "backgroundColor": "white"
  },
  "sliderTrack": {
    "width": "100%",
    "height": "6px",
    "backgroundColor": "lightgray",
    "borderRadius": "3px",
    "position": "relative"
  },
  "sliderThumb": {
    "width": "20px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "borderRadius": "50%",
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "-7px",
    "left": "50%",
    "transform": "translateX(-50%)",
    "cursor": "pointer"
  }
}

requirement: System shall ensure display a progress bar for file uploads
Functionality: Selection, drag and drop, size validation, uploading, storage
css:
{
  "uploadIconWrapper": {
    "width": "100px",
    "height": "100px",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "backgroundColor": "white"
  },
  "uploadIcon": {
    "width": "50px",
    "height": "50px",
    "border": "2px solid black",
    "borderTop": "none",
    "borderRadius": "0 0 5px 5px",
    "position": "relative",
    "boxSizing": "border-box"
  },
  "arrowUp": {
    "width": "0",
    "height": "0",
    "borderLeft": "15px solid transparent",
    "borderRight": "15px solid transparent",
    "borderBottom": "25px solid black",
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "-25px",
    "left": "10px"
  }
}

requirement: Show a calendar for date selection.
css:
{
  "dropdown": {
    "width": "500px",
    "height": "50px",
    "border": "1px solid gray",
    "borderRadius": "4px",
    "backgroundColor": "white",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "space-between",
    "padding": "0 10px",
    "boxShadow": "0 0 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)"
  },
  "dropdownText": {
    "flex": "1",
    "fontSize": "16px",
    "color": "black"
  },
  "dropdownIcon": {
    "width": "50px",
    "height": "100%",
    "backgroundColor": "lightgray",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "borderLeft": "1px solid gray",
    "cursor": "pointer"
  },
  "icon": {
    "fontSize": "24px",
    "color": "black",
    "transform": "rotate(0deg)"
  }
}

requirement: Provide a password input field
Functionality: login screens, search bars, and forms.

requirement: The system shall display a customizable logo/avatar for user identification.
css:
{
  "avatar-container": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "100px",
    "height": "100px",
    "border": "4px solid black",
    "borderRadius": "50%",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "boxSizing": "border-box"
  },
  "avatar-head": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "20px",
    "width": "30px",
    "height": "30px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "borderRadius": "50%"
  },
  "avatar-body": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "50px",
    "width": "40px",
    "height": "30px",
    "borderTop": "4px solid black",
    "borderLeft": "4px solid black",
    "borderRight": "4px solid black",
    "borderBottom": "none",
    "borderRadius": "20px 20px 0 0"
  }
}

The snack bar shall provide user feedback with an option to include an action button.
The system shall display a pop-up for critical alerts that require user action.
The system shall support user input forms with validation and submission feedback.
The system shall provide visual indicators for real-time status updates.
content should be grouped in rectangular sections for better organization.
The system shall present items in a structured list format with selectable elements.
The navigation bar shall provide quick access to primary system functions.
The system shall provide radio buttons for mutually exclusive selections.
The system shall display banners for promotional or informational messages.
The system shall support hierarchical menu structures for intuitive navigation.
The system shall provide interactive buttons for user actions.
Icons shall visually represent system functions and actions.
The system shall provide icon buttons for compact interactions.

requirement: The system shall include a toggle switch for binary settings.
The system shall provide a link button for navigation to external content.
css:
{
  "component": "LinkButtonIcon",
  "style": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "100px",
    "height": "100px",
    "borderRadius": "16px",
    "border": "4px solid black",
    "boxSizing": "border-box",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "backgroundColor": "white"
  },
  "elements": {
    "arrow-line": {
      "position": "absolute",
      "width": "60px",
      "height": "10px",
      "backgroundColor": "black",
      "top": "20px",
      "left": "20px",
      "transform": "rotate(45deg)",
      "transformOrigin": "left center"
    },
    "arrow-head": {
      "position": "absolute",
      "width": "0",
      "height": "0",
      "borderTop": "10px solid transparent",
      "borderBottom": "10px solid transparent",
      "borderLeft": "15px solid black",
      "top": "10px",
      "right": "10px",
      "transform": "rotate(45deg)"
    },
    "box-corner": {
      "position": "absolute",
      "width": "60px",
      "height": "60px",
      "border": "8px solid black",
      "borderTop": "none",
      "borderRight": "none",
      "bottom": "0",
      "left": "0",
      "borderRadius": "12px"
    }
  }
}

requirement: The system shall support image display with scaling options.
The system shall allow captions for images to provide additional context.
The system shall display titles with customizable font size and style.
The system shall provide subtitles for additional context under titles.
The system shall support paragraph text with formatting options.
css:
{
  "component": "ParagraphSymbol",
  "style": {
    "width": "100px",
    "height": "100px",
    "borderRadius": "50%",                  // Circular shape
    "backgroundColor": "white",             // Background behind the symbol
    "border": "2px solid black",            // Thin black border
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "fontSize": "48px",                     // Prominent symbol size
    "fontWeight": "bold",
    "color": "black",                       // Symbol color
    "fontFamily": "Arial, sans-serif",
    "boxShadow": "0px 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)", // Subtle shadow
    "margin": "10px"
  },
  "content": "§"
}

css:
{
  "thermometer-container": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "20px",
    "height": "120px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "borderRadius": "10px",
    "margin": "auto"
  },
  "thermometer-bulb": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "bottom": "-30px",
    "left": "-20px",
    "width": "60px",
    "height": "60px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "borderRadius": "50%"
  },
  "bar1": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "right": "-30px",
    "top": "15px",
    "width": "40px",
    "height": "10px",
    "backgroundColor": "black"
  },
  "bar2": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "right": "-30px",
    "top": "45px",
    "width": "40px",
    "height": "10px",
    "backgroundColor": "black"
  },
  "bar3": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "right": "-30px",
    "top": "75px",
    "width": "40px",
    "height": "10px",
    "backgroundColor": "black"
  },
  "wave1": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "bottom": "-60px",
    "left": "-40px",
    "width": "150px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundImage": "repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, transparent 5px, black 5px, black 15px)",
    "borderBottom": "5px solid black",
    "borderTopLeftRadius": "10px",
    "borderTopRightRadius": "10px"
  },
  "wave2": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "bottom": "-80px",
    "left": "-40px",
    "width": "150px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundImage": "repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, transparent 5px, black 5px, black 15px)",
    "borderBottom": "5px solid black",
    "borderTopLeftRadius": "10px",
    "borderTopRightRadius": "10px"
  }
}

requirement: The system shall display a real-time compass for directional guidance.
Functionality: navigation systems in automotive and marine dashboards
css:
{
  "compass-container": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "200px",
    "height": "200px",
    "border": "8px solid black",
    "borderRadius": "50%",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center"
  },
  "compass-needle": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "width": "4px",
    "height": "90px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "transformOrigin": "bottom center",
    "transform": "rotate(0deg)"
  },
  "needle-tip": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "10px",
    "left": "calc(50% - 8px)",
    "width": "0",
    "height": "0",
    "borderLeft": "8px solid transparent",
    "borderRight": "8px solid transparent",
    "borderBottom": "20px solid white"
  },
  "direction-n": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "5px",
    "left": "50%",
    "transform": "translateX(-50%)",
    "fontWeight": "bold"
  },
  "direction-s": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "bottom": "5px",
    "left": "50%",
    "transform": "translateX(-50%)",
    "fontWeight": "bold"
  },
  "direction-e": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "50%",
    "right": "5px",
    "transform": "translateY(-50%)",
    "fontWeight": "bold"
  },
  "direction-w": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "50%",
    "left": "5px",
    "transform": "translateY(-50%)",
    "fontWeight": "bold"
  }
}

requirement: The system shall display vehicle speed in digital format with an option to switch between km/h and mph
The infotainment system shall display the engineâ€™s RPM digitally with real-time updates.
The system shall allow users to enable or disable the digital power display via settings
The infotainment system shall display the current gear position (P, R, N, D, L) in real-time
The system shall display the selected manual gear mode (M1 to Mx) when in manual shift mode
The driver shall have the option to disable the gear shift recommendation display.
The system shall display paddle shifter engagement status when the driver uses manual shifting
The infotainment system shall display a digital speedometer with an option to switch between analog and digital views
The tachometer shall update in real-time based on engine speed data
css:
{
  "tachometer-wrapper": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "200px",
    "height": "200px",
    "borderRadius": "50%",
    "border": "12px solid black",
    "boxSizing": "border-box",
    "overflow": "hidden"
  },
  "center-dot": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "50%",
    "left": "50%",
    "width": "20px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "borderRadius": "50%",
    "transform": "translate(-50%, -50%)"
  },
  "needle": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "50%",
    "left": "50%",
    "width": "6px",
    "height": "80px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "transformOrigin": "bottom center",
    "transform": "translateX(-50%) rotate(-45deg)"
  },
  "tick1": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "10px",
    "left": "50%",
    "width": "4px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "transform": "translateX(-50%) rotate(0deg)",
    "transformOrigin": "bottom center"
  },
  "tick2": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "20px",
    "left": "85%",
    "width": "4px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "transform": "rotate(45deg)",
    "transformOrigin": "bottom center"
  },
  "tick3": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "50%",
    "left": "95%",
    "width": "4px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "transform": "rotate(90deg)",
    "transformOrigin": "bottom center"
  },
  "tick4": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "85%",
    "left": "85%",
    "width": "4px",
    "height": "20px",
    "backgroundColor": "black",
    "transform": "rotate(135deg)",
    "transformOrigin": "bottom center"
  }
}

requirement: The fuel gauge shall update dynamically based on sensor data from the fuel tank.
The system shall display the engine coolant temperature with a gauge.
The power display shall be dynamically updated based on engine load
css:
{
  "car-body": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "120px",
    "height": "60px",
    "border": "4px solid black",
    "borderRadius": "10px",
    "borderTopLeftRadius": "30px",
    "margin": "20px auto",
    "boxSizing": "border-box"
  },
  "car-door": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "20px",
    "left": "20px",
    "width": "20px",
    "height": "15px",
    "border": "3px solid black",
    "borderRadius": "4px",
    "boxSizing": "border-box"
  },
  "car-front": {
    "position": "absolute",
    "top": "5px",
    "left": "-25px",
    "width": "30px",
    "height": "30px",
    "border": "4px solid black",
    "borderRight": "none",
    "borderRadius": "10px 0 0 10px",
    "boxSizing": "border-box"
  },
  "bolt-circle": {
    "position": "absolute",

  "/* Container for the missed call icon */": {},

    "background-color": "white",      /* Icon background */

  ".missed-call-icon .icon": {
    "width": "100%",
    "height": "100%",
    "object-fit": "contain",
    "filter": "invert(0%)"            /* Keeps icon black on white bg */
  }
}

    "border-radius": "12px",          /* Rounded edges */
    "background-color": "white",      /* Icon background */
    "box-shadow": "2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)" /* Subtle shadow */
  },

  "/* Actual image inside the icon container */": {},
  ".missed-call-icon .icon": {
    "width": "100%",
    "height": "100%",
    "object-fit": "contain",
    "filter": "invert(0%)"            /* Keeps icon black on white bg */
  }
}

requirement: The system should provide real-time navigation map updates synchronized with vehicle movement.
css:
{
  "component": "NavigationMapSyncIcon",
  "style": {
    "position": "relative",
    "width": "120px",
    "height": "120px",
    "borderRadius": "50%",
    "border": "4px solid black",
    "boxSizing": "border-box",
    "display": "flex",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "backgroundColor": "white"
  },
  "elements": {
    "compass-needle": {
      "position": "absolute",
      "width": "4px",
      "height": "60px",
      "backgroundColor": "black",
      "transformOrigin": "bottom center",
      "transform": "rotate(45deg)"
    },
    "sync-arrow1": {
      "position": "absolute",
      "top": "20px",
      "left": "20px",
      "width": "0",
      "height": "0",
      "borderTop": "10px solid transparent",
      "borderBottom": "10px solid transparent",
      "borderLeft": "15px solid black",
      "transform": "rotate(45deg)"
    },
    "sync-arrow2": {
      "position": "absolute",
      "bottom": "20px",
      "right": "20px",
      "width": "0",
      "height": "0",
      "borderTop": "10px solid transparent",
      "borderBottom": "10px solid transparent",
      "borderRight": "15px solid black",
      "transform": "rotate(-135deg)"
    }
  }
}
